name: Star Duck Charity Jam 2013
description:
Old Jam game I made for Charity Jam. I noticed the original host was having trouble hosting all the games, so I thought I would post this here.

Orie Falconer did the awesome soundtrack

Troy Morrissey did the VO and SFX

Bryce Hunter's Chin plays the evil Dr Chin

Everything else was done by me except the picture of the duck, which I found on Google. The puppet was bought for me by my loving wife (at the time she was my girlfriend, but when a girl buys you a puppet, you lock that down.)
